Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package multus is earlier than 4.0.2-2, affected by CVE-2023-3978
